name: Linear combination - Wikipediaen.wikipedia.org › wiki › Linear_combination
description: From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia. In mathematics, a linear combination is an expression constructed from a set of terms by multiplying each term by a constant and adding the results (e.g. a linear combination of x and y would be any expression of the form ax + by, where a and b are constants).
